channel.title: About Us on El Pudu: Living and working from our Airstream
channel.description: Recent content in About Us on El Pudu: Living and working from our Airstream

item.title: About Matt
item.description: Hi, I’m Matt! I’m a Devops Engineer that works a lot with Jenkins while we travel around. I try to split my year between the forests of the US as well as the forests of Chile. From December to May, my lovely wife and I spent our winter in Pucon Chile, rafting and getting a second lease on summer. Upon our return, we decided that instead of renting a house again or purchasing a piece of property in the city, that we would buy an Airstream and spend the next while traveling around looking for our next home base.
